abstract: These days it can be hard for a new Web site to attract attention. So many companies have tried creating a sense of exclusivity.
snippet: These days it can be hard for a new Web site to attract attention. So many companies have tried creating a sense of exclusivity.
lead_paragraph: Demand for Google’s new social networking service, Google+, has been intense since its debut last month in a limited test mode. To get in, you must be invited by someone who is already a member, so Facebook and Twitter are peppered with requests for invitations to the service, and they have even been sold on eBay.

headline.main: To Pique Interest, Start-Ups Try a Digital Velvet Rope
headline.print_headline: Some Start-Ups Pique Interest by Invitation Only
